S195B.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. NONCOM (CORPORAL OR ANY GRADE OF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN) 4. SOME OTHER RANK OR GRADE 0. NO ANSWER
S195B.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 TO 24 YEARS 3. 25 TO 29 YEARS 4. 30 TO 34 YEARS 5. 35 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q4A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE WORK YOU ARE DOING RIGHT NOW AS COMPARED WITH OTHER JOBS YOU MIGHT BE DOING IN THE ARM?  1. IT IS AS IMPORTANT AS ANY OTHER JOB I COULD DO 2. IT IS FAIRLY IMPORTANT, BUT I COULD DO MORE IMPORTANT WORK 3. IT HARDLY SEEMS IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q25. DO YOUR OFFICERS GIVE YOU A GOOD CHANCE TO ASK QUESTIONS AS TO THE REASON WHY THINGS ARE DONE THE WAY THEY AR?  1. YES, ALWAYS 2. YES, USUALLY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO, NOT VERY OFTEN 5. NO, ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S195B.Q26. HOW OFTEN DOES IT HAPPEN THAT YOU ARE CALLED DOWN OR PUNISHED FOR SOMETHING YOU DIDN'T D?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. OFTEN 3. SOMETIMES 4. HARDLY EVER 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S195B.Q27. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR ME?  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER
S195B.Q28. DO YOU THINK THAT YOUR OFFICERS GENERALLY DO WHAT THEY CAN TO HELP YO?  1. YES, ALL THE TIME 2. YES, MOST OF THE TIME 3. NO, THEY OFTEN DO NOT 4. NO, THEY ALMOST NEVER DO 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q29. HOW WELL DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR OFFICERS UNDERSTAND YOUR PROBLEMS AND NEED?  1. THEY ARE VERY MUCH AWARE OF MY PROBLEMS AND NEEDS 2. THEY ARE FAIRLY WELL AWARE OF MY PROBLEMS AND NEEDS 3. THEY DO NOT KNOW VERY MUCH ABOUT MY REAL PROBLEMS OR NEEDS 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q30. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR OFFICERS RECOGNIZE YOUR ABILITIES AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO D?  1. YES, I'M SURE THEY DO 2. YES, I THINK THEY DO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK THEY DO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q32. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS USE THEIR RANK IN WAYS THAT SEEM UNNECESSARY TO YO?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. SOME OF THEM DO 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q36. WHEN YOUR OFFICERS GIVE YOU SOMETHING TO DO, DO THEY TELL YOU ENOUGH ABOUT IT SO THAT YOU CAN DO A GOOD JO?  1. ALWAYS TELL ME ENOUGH 2. USUALLY TELL ME ENOUGH 3. OFTEN DO NOT TELL ME ENOUGH 4. ALMOST NEVER TELL ME ENOUGH 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S195B.Q37. HOW MANY OF YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS ARE THE KIND WHO ARE WILLING TO GO THROUGH ANYTHING THEY ASK THEIR MEN TO GO THROUG?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

SOMEWHAT BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 4. MUCH BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
